title: Who actually builds spellbinder?
body: I build it on champs sometimes for fun but does anyone actually use it as a core item?

replies.body: I use it with shaco it's really good late game
It's pretty core on Vlad, at least bot lane. Stack up the Spellbinder, R-Flash-E-Q, they dead

Honestly it's not core on any champion. Just a "for fun" item.

i build it when i need to run away. or when i want to 1 shot people. or if i have 25 stacks on soul stealer. or if i want max ap. or if i just want to build it. or if i have celerity+water walking+phase rush+slightly magical boots of swiftness+ghost+skuttle crab shrine+3 more spell binders+a rabadon deathcap+a sivir ultimate+4 more movement speeds boosts while playing as janna.
{{champion:28}} is the only one who builds it, not quite core, but in 90% of games as one of her last items. She's the only one that can stack it quickly and make use of its combination of stats.

People who 
1 need to win really big fights/important fights for an objective
2 remember they have active items in their inventory

I'm not really sure who was it designed for. Both mages and ap assassins have better options.
